item.description:
Celebrate Your Pet's Right to a Play & Stay Summer! We'll have lots of FUN Games & Activities to entertain our four legged friends....Playing in the Sand box, Splashing in the Pool, Bobbing for Hot dogs, an Ice Cream Eating Contest, & more! So bring your Pal for Fourth of July fun!

RSVP 978-649-8585
Proof of Current Vaccines Required: Rabies, DHLPP, Bordatella
www.bestfriendspetcare.com
item.name: Fourth of July Fun!
